nameEntry.part: Salvation Army, Nedlands Library Local Studies Collection

biogHist.abstract: The Salvation Army, Nedlands Library Local Studies Collection is a small collection of photographs, oral histories, books and other memorabilia relating to the Salvation Army, the Salvation Army Boy's Home and the Hollywood Children's Village. Some of these can be found through the online catalogue, but there are other items that can be seen by making an appointment with a librarian.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Salvation Army, Nedlands Library Local Studies Collection', in Find & Connect - Western Australia,

bibref.title: Salvation Army, Nedlands Library Local Studies Collection

resourceRelation.relationEntry: The Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Sign

archref.unittitle: The Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Sign
archref.abstract: 'The Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Sign' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Salvation Army Nedlands drawings and plans

archref.unittitle: Salvation Army Nedlands drawings and plans
archref.abstract: 'Salvation Army Nedlands drawings and plans' is a digital copy of five images held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. The item shows pencil drawings, apparently from memory by an unknown person, of the buildings and layout of the Salvation Army Boys' Home and Hollywood Children's Village. It shows the bonfire site (1956) and the female officers' quarters. From 1965 smaller cottages were built at the Village, and these are not shown in the drawings.

archref.repository: Nedlands Library; Salvation Army Heritage Museum WA, Local Studies Collection and Nedlands Boys Home closed social work file (Salvation Army Heritage Museum WA)
archref.abstract: 'Salvation Army Boys' Home, Nedlands, 1936' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection and the Nedlands Boys Home closed social work file at the Salvation Army Heritage Museum WA. The museum version has a typed caption that reads, 'William St. Front Entrance Nedlands Boy's Home - 1936'. There are people on the verandah.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Quadrangle and Dormitories

archref.unittitle: Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Quadrangle and Dormitories
archref.abstract: 'Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Quadrangle and Dormitories' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. The date is uncertain. There was no quadrangle until 1941. The buildings around the quadrangle were repainted in 1954 and colour images of that area show lighter paint used on windowsills.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Quadrangle

archref.unittitle: Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Quadrangle
archref.abstract: 'Salvation Army Boys' Home Nedlands, Quadrangle' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. The date is uncertain. There was no quadrangle until 1941. The buildings around the quadrangle were repainted in 1954 and colour images of that area show lighter paint used on windowsills.

'Nedlands Quad 02' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. The image is undated. It is possible that this photograph was taken before the Salvation Army Boys' Home was converted to the Hollywood Children's Village.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Nedlands p152361 kitchen and dining room [Salvation Army]

archref.unittitle: Nedlands p152361 kitchen and dining room [Salvation Army]
archref.abstract: 'Nedlands p152361 kitchen and dining room' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. The date is uncertain. There was no quadrangle until 1941. The buildings around the quadrangle were repainted in 1954 and colour images of that area show lighter paint used on windowsills.
'Nedlands Lasses Cottage' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. 'Lasses' or 'Lassies' were female Salvationists.

'Nedlands Drive' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection, showing some little boys playing in the distance. It is possible that this photograph was taken before the Salvation Army Boys' Home was converted to the Hollywood Children's Village.

'Nedlands Dorms' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. The image is undated. It is possible that this photograph was taken before the Salvation Army Boys' Home was converted to the Hollywood Children's Village.

'Nedlands Boys' Home, Dining Room' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. The image is undated. There were renovations to the Home in 1951-1954 and the furniture is consistent with that era, so it is likely that the photograph was taken after 1950 on a special occasion.

'Nedlands Boys c.1962 04' is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection. It shows the entrance sign for the Salvation Army Boys' Home at Nedlands.

archref.repository: Nedlands Library, Local Studies Collection, Salvation Army
archref.abstract: This is an image of the entrance to the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands. The image is a digital copy of an item held in the Salvation Army Children's Homes, Nedlands Library Pictorial Collection.
'The Salvation Army' is a digital copy of an item held in the Local Studies Collection of the Nedlands Library.
